divs: Sighting Detailsit was march 21st about 4 PM, i was in mexico city during spring break. I was going to the the market place with my aunt. i told my aunt if she sees that orb in the sky and she says its a ovni(ufo). it was the color red and it didnt move. It was about 75 to 100 feet high.I saw A guy videotaping the ufo. in just 1 minute, the object disappeared. No one knew what it was. I told the guy recording the ufo if he got it and he sad that he is going to show the news people. Ive never had seen nothing like it in my life.
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Mexico City
There were no other sightings in Mexico City on or around March 21st 2010
